description:
# Customer

A customer, who is sometimes known as a client, buyer, or purchaser is the one who receives goods, services, products, or ideas, from a seller for a monetary consideration.

### Creating a customer is easy and can be done in the following steps

1. Go to the Customer list and click on New.
2. Enter Full Name of the customer.
3. Select **Company** if the customer represents a company or **Individual** otherwise in Type field.
4. Select a Customer Group. A few groups are included by default, you can create additional groups if you need.
5. Select the Territory.
6. If the customer is being created against a lead, you can select the same in From Lead field.
7. Save.

Up next is a video about customers and suppliers that will give you more clarity on these concepts in ERPNext
name: Create a Customer
title: Create a Customer
